name: Yahtzee: Roll Dice, Win Cash
description:
• An exciting new spin on classic Yahtzee
• Challenge real people for the highest scores!
• Top scores win real $$ CASH!

Can you score a YAHTZEE?! Your favorite dice game just got more fun with REAL CASH $$ PRIZES! Go head-to-head against other players to compete for top points. Spin the reels to go for the best combos and use power-ups and multipliers to maximize your score.

How to play:
• “Roll” to spin the reels. You get 3 spins per turn to score the highest number of points.
• Select the dice you want to hold.
• Once you hit a hand you want to keep, tap the corresponding hand in the score card.
• Create combos like Full House and Large Run to score top points.
• Score a Yahtzee with 5 dice of the same number for an extra 1,000 points.
• Use power-ups and multipliers to maximize your score.
• Score as many points as possible by filling in your score card.

Tips:
• There is no x2 bonus that appears on the Yahtzee, so activate it the first chance you get.
• Try to snag the large run scorecard when there is a x2 on it as it is the 2nd highest scoring chance besides the Yahtzee.
• The Sum scorecard will always be worth more than 0. Save it as a bailout for bad hands so you can achieve a full card bonus.
• Collecting a power-up when you have 3 stored will net you a small score bonus instead of the new power-up.

Totally fair and skill based- every player gets the same game and time limits
Tons of fun tournament options- practice your skills before playing for higher stakes
Yahtzee Roll Dice Win Cash is enabled by WorldWinner's more than 20 years of fair play and big prizes
Secure deposits & easy withdrawals
Skill-based, real-money competitions are not available in all locations.

Questions? Visit https://worldwinnermobile.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
